Metadata.title: Javier Goldschmidt | Full Stack Developer
Metadata.description: Building digital platforms and scalable web systems. Currently at El Gato y La Caja.

Hero.title: Javier Goldschmidt
Hero.about1: I'm a developer with <highlight>12 years of experience</highlight> building everything from video games in Unity to complex web platforms. My work sits at the intersection of <highlight>code</highlight> and <highlight>product design</highlight>.
Hero.about2: Currently, I'm a Full Stack Developer at <link>El Gato y La Caja</link>, where I've spent the last 9 years building the digital infrastructure for its science communication platform and ecommerce. From login systems to analytics dashboards and e-commerce integrations.
Hero.about3: I specialize in <highlight>responsive React frontends</highlight> and <highlight>Node, PHP and Python backends</highlight>. I also have experience developing video games and native mobile applications.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: If you'd like to discuss a project or just say hi:

elgato.title: Full Stack Developer
elgato.description: Started as the first technical hire. Built the foundational web stack and established engineering practices that scaled with the company. Now leading development of digital infrastructure. Built SSO systems, analytics tools, and e-commerce integrations serving 240k+ users.

freelance.title: Web & Mobile Developer
freelance.description: Freelance work building Web and Android applications. Shipped multiple projects and learned the foundations of performance optimization and user experience.

university.title: Bachelor's Degree in Digital Technologies
university.company: Universidad de la Ciudad de Buenos Aires

gridx-ecosystem.title: GridX: Platform for Scientists and Investors
gridx-ecosystem.shortDescription: Platform for LatAm's largest Biotech Company Builder.
gridx-ecosystem.fullDescription: Central digital hub for a biotech startup incubator. Institutional Frontend development and platform showcasing startup information to global investors while maintaining update ease for non-technical staff.

impact.0: Architected a scalable Internationalization (i18n) system serving content in English, Spanish, and Portuguese with low latency
impact.1: WordPress-controlled frontend & form builder where admins can route submissions to specific Airtable bases or Emails
impact.2: Implemented video optimization for AI-generated assets
impact.3: Built a dynamic portfolio system managing data for 90+ startups

gridx-ecosystem.company: El Gato y La Caja / GridX

bancantes-platform.title: Bancantes: Membership Management
bancantes-platform.shortDescription: Custom membership platform with an automated Inflation Shield and gamification.
bancantes-platform.fullDescription: A bespoke membership ecosystem serving 1,500+ monthly subscribers. Unlike standard SaaS tools, this platform was designed to handle the specific economic volatility of the region while keeping users engaged through gamification.

impact.0: Inflation Adjustment Engine: An opt-in system that fetches Consumer Price Index (CPC) data via API and automatically updates subscription values quarterly
impact.1: Unified Payment Orchestration Layer triggering transactions via MercadoPago, PayPal, and CBU (Bank Debit) APIs
impact.2: 3D Avatar Creator: WebGL (Three.js) allowing users to design, download, and share branded digital assets
impact.3: Management of migration and stability for 1,500+ active recurring subscribers

el-gato-migration.title: Headless Architecture Migration
el-gato-migration.shortDescription: Transition of the company's main platform to Serverless Next.js.
el-gato-migration.fullDescription: Complete migration of El Gato y La Caja from a monolithic WordPress VPS to a Headless architecture. The goal was to maintain the editorial flexibility of WordPress while achieving the performance and security of a static frontend.

impact.0: Migration of 6 years of content to Next.js (App Router) with Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR)
impact.1: Smart Revalidation: Custom plugin that triggers precise cache purges, reducing processing costs
impact.2: Custom Gutenberg blocks that render identical React components in both the Admin and Frontend
impact.3: Reduced hosting costs by offloading media to S3 Buckets via custom-made plugin

extras-middleware.title: E-commerce Middleware
extras-middleware.shortDescription: Extending Tiendanube with custom inventory logic, programmatic asset generation and better analytics.
extras-middleware.fullDescription: Backend service built to patch the limitations of Tiendanube e-commerce platform. It acts as a bridge between the storefront, the warehouse, and the user.

impact.0: Virtual Bundling: Stock synchronization for compound products in real-time
impact.1: Gift Card system that generates unique codes and renders printable high-res PNGs on the fly
impact.2: Product extension with Pre-sale functionality to allow users to purchase products before they are available
impact.3: Extension of Tiendanube Admin Panel UI using Nexo SDK for seamless staff operations
impact.4: Automation of Ebooks and Giftcards delivery
impact.5: Micro-frontend that embeds real-time Tiendanube products directly inside editorial content to convert free readers into buyers without interrupting their reading experience.
impact.6: Dashboard creation using Looker Studio for staff and authors to visualize sales data and inventory levels unified with Mercadolibre

scrollytelling-suite.title: Interactive Data Journalism
scrollytelling-suite.shortDescription: Suite of storytelling platforms for complex social datasets.
scrollytelling-suite.fullDescription: Development of multiple data journalism projects. Specialized in transforming datasets (gender gaps, poverty metrics, disability rights) into emotional, accessible web experiences.

impact.0: Futuro Programado: Visualization of the gender gap in tech with custom SVG animations
impact.1: Parece Elemental: Scrollytelling optimization with heavy media for low-end devices in areas with limited connectivity
impact.2: CLACAI: Construction of a WCAG 2.1 AA compliant platform specifically for screen readers and keyboard navigation
impact.3: Eureka 3D: An interactive book for children running in the browser

scrollytelling-suite.company: El Gato y La Caja / Various Clients

cybershock-game.title: Cybershock: Future Parkour
cybershock-game.fullDescription: A high-speed 3D runner built in Unity. Development of core physics, gameplay loops, and UI systems.

impact.0: Launch of a commercial title, managing the full release lifecycle
impact.2: Implementation of aggressive object pooling for performance
impact.3: 3000+ downloads and overwhelmingly positive feedback on Steam
